Hey folks!

SpeedyPage is a new, London based cloud hosting provider with an absolute focus on providing the best hosting, at an affordable price.

All servers are provided with 3Gbit network ports, and are provisioned on the SolusIO (SolusVM 2.0) control panel.
<br>
<hr>
**KVM VPS Offers**<br>
**KVM-2G - usually £4.99 per month, now only £2.99 ($4 USD)**
* 1 CPU Core (Intel Silver 4114 or above+)
* 2GB of DDR4 RAM
* 30GB RAID SSD Disk Space
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 3Gbps Network Port
* [Order Now
](https://my.speedypage.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=15&promocode=LET2G "Order Now
")

**KVM-4G - usually £9.99 per month, now only £4.99 ($6.72 USD)**
* 2 CPU Cores (Intel Silver 4114 or above+)
* 4GB of DDR4 RAM
* 60GB RAID SSD Disk Space
* 8TB Bandwidth @ 3Gbps Network Port
* [Order Now
](https://my.speedypage.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&promocode=LET4G "Order Now
")


Whilst these offers currently do not include backups, we are currently looking into offering this, free of charge across all plans in the near future once there has been some development changes that allow us to do this in the way we need on the SolusIO control panel.

<br>
Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Do you have a looking glass?
A: https://lon.lg.speedypage.uk

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We currently accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Card & Google/Apple Pay.

Q: No IPv6? Why?
A: We are currently awaiting some further development from the SolusIO team in regards to IPv6. As soon as we have an update we are waiting on, IPv6 will be provided.

Q: Do you charge VAT?
A: We do not charge any EU/UK VAT at this time.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: All of our offerings are based out of Telehouse North, in central London.

Q: Can these offers be changed at all?
A: Just reach out via our live chat or ticket system and we can see if we can do something custom for you!

Q: What form of virtualization is being used?
A: We offer KVM servers only, from the SolusIO control panel.
